text: Wahi hai jisne Suraj ko ujyala banaya aur chand ko chamak di aur chand ke ghatne badhne ki manzilein theek theek muqarrar kardi taa-ke tum ussey barason (years) aur tareekhon ke hisaab maloom karo. Allah ne yeh sab kuch (khel ke taur par nahin balke) ba-maqsad hi banaya hai. Woh apni nishaniyoun ko khol khol kar pesh kar raha hai un logon ke liye jo ilm rakhte hain
